featured.text: There is no death; only a change of worlds—the author delivers these reassurances to readers in this book, based on the customs of the Plains Indians in America.

definition.zh_def: 安慰，讓人感到安心或放心的行為或言語。
definition.en_def: The action of removing someone's doubts or fears; comfort or encouragement.
definition.example: She offered him reassurance that everything would be fine.
